<!-- This file was autogenerated from Style.js do not modify -->
## <MapplsGL.Style />
### Style is a component that automatically adds sources / layers to the map using Mappls GL Style Spec.<br/>Only `sources` & `layers` are supported.<br/>Other fields such as `sprites`, `glyphs` etc. will be ignored. Not all layer / source attributes from the style spec are supported.

### props
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
| ---- | :--: | :-----: | :------: | :----------: |
| json | `any` | `none` | `false` | A JSON object conforming to the schema described in the Mappls Style Specification , or a URL to such JSON. |
